scripts.say: NA Ocean NW Sector - Part one of Operation Siren has me deployed alongside one of the Eagle Union's fleets.
They caught us off guard the last time, but the tables have turned! Now it’s our turn to launch a surprise attack on the Sirens!
I couldn't make it to Bermuda before, but now it’s a different story! I'm prepped and ready!
The Siren presence is waning around most of the NA Ocean, with the exception of the Bermuda sector. They refocused their efforts and took it back from us.
They must've had a good reason for that, although I can't say what that might be...
Perhaps that hunch of yours is the very reason why headquarters tasked us, and the Commander, with, uhh, re-re-reclaiming the sector? This back-and-forth is getting a little confusing......
In any case, we need to reclaim it sooner or later. We'll find out what’s really going on once it’s back in our hands.
